content.question: In this passage, the author mainly promotes

choices.label: the assertion of Black women's agency
broader circulation of works by Black writers
social programs that support rural communities
respect for the uniqueness of different cultures

content.answer: the assertion of Black women's agency

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
